metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7226 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in vcSetXCutTextProc() in VNConsole.c in LinuxVNC and VNCommand from the LibVNC/vncterm distribution through 0.9.10. Missing sanitization of the client-specified message length may cause integer overflow or possibly have unspecified other impact via a specially crafted VNC packet.

criterions.comment: vncterm package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
